bsh

Class PlexInterpreter

  • java.lang.Object
    • bsh.Interpreter
      • bsh.PlexInterpreter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    bsh.ConsoleInterface, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable

    public class PlexInterpreter
extends bsh.Interpreter
    The PlexInterpreter class is a wrapper for Interpreter whose only purpose at the moment is to allow users to log their input to a file. The PlexReader class is the one that does the actual logging. Instances of this class are easier to get our hands on in some scripts, so we put methods to enable/disable logging and specify the logfile name in here.
    See Also:
